name: Doki Doki Makai Castle Kiva Gashat

pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ex-Aid "Tricks": Kamen Rider Genm (2016, web series)$(br2)Used to access Ex-Aid's $(l:ex_aid/riders/ex-aid#kiva)Kiva Gamer Level 2$(/l)
Obtained by using $(l:ex_aid/items/blank_gashat)Unfinished Gashats$(/l) on the $(l:misc/blocks/ganbarizing_machine)Ganbarizing Machine$(/l)
